description: Choose the Tungsten GORE-TEX Jacket and Pants for when snow, ice, and wind are guaranteed to send the less prepared home. Dialed ski and snowboard features, GORE-TEX waterproof protection, and durable VerticalX™ insulation ensure no temperature can get in the way between you and the mountain. Best for bitter cold days in the resort when you’re worried about retaining warmth on the chair lift, the Tungsten’s VerticalX™ insulation will actually self-regulate your sweat in order to keep you warmer, for longer, even when wet.
name: Outdoor Research Tungsten Jacket - Mens
